name: AUTO PUMPKIN
description:
Auto Pumpkin is a clicker game made for the 6wrni game jam

your objective is to fully automate the farm using AUTOMATORS

but to do so, you have to collect SEEDS to buy them,

SEEDS come from farming PUMPKINS.

you farm PUMPKINS by making HOLES and planting PUMPKIN SEEDS in them

with seeds, you can:

increase the number of HOLES allowed at the same time,

increase the speed of farming,

and buy AUTOMATORS

to fully automate the farm, you have to buy LANDs and they are quite expensive

CONTROLS:

make HOLE: right mouse button

plant PUMPKIN: right mouse button

harvest PUMPKIN: left mouse button

info:

made by Hossine#6070 on discord.

sounds effects from soundly.
